'''Radiant Spincrystal 116''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Les fumees blanches]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in the [[Foggy Forest Path]].
